About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am Jonathan Malicdem Caburnay, 21 years old. I was born on June 10, 1997 at Dagupan City, Pangasinan. I currently live at Poblacion, Bugallon, Pangasinan. I recently graduated from college and currently seeking for my first job.

Elementary

2002 - 2009

I finished my primary school at Bugallon Integrated School which is just near from our house. I learned how to play table tennis when I was on 5th grade and even competed at Milo Little Olympics on 6th grade.

High School

2009 - 2013

I attended my high school at Pangasinan National High School. My interest in physics was developed in this level. I also started playing PC games such as DoTA, Boomz and League of Legends.

College

2013 - 2018

I graduated at University of the Philippines - Baguio with a bachelor's degree of science in Physics. My thesis was focused on the ability of graphene-based material to convert heat into electrical energy. I have experience in MatLab and Arduino programming. I started self-studying web development programming to improve my skills in programming. In addition to becoming a well-known scientist I also want to become a software engineer/full stack developer.
